parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Lock vehicle (disable mounting / dismounting) for player.
This command will remove user get in/get out actions but will not stop player getting into or out of vehicle via script commands (e.g [[moveInCargo]]).<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Alternative syntax is similar to [[setVehicleLock]] but with numbers.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName [[lock]] locked </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> locked: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to lock, [[false]] to unlock </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> vehicleName [[lock]] lockstate &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(''Since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v0.50'') </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> lockstate: [[Number]] - Can be one of the following:<br>
0 - Unlocked<br>
1 - Default (player subordinate cannot enter until his leader says so)<br>
2 - Locked<br>
3 - Locked for player </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_jeepOne [[lock]] [[true]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>heli [[lock]] [[true]];
[[locked]] heli; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>2</value></part></template>

heli [[lock]] [[false]];
[[locked]] heli; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>0</value></part></template>

heli [[lock]] 1;
[[locked]] heli; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>1</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[locked]], [[setVehicleLock]], [[lockDriver]], [[lockCargo]], [[lockTurret]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on January 9, 2010 - 22:50
<dt class="note">[[User:Tankbuster|Tankbuster]]
<dd class="note">Lock prevents AI persons mounting or dismounting vehicles when ordered to do so and players are prevented from doing both too, but AI will still dismount when a vehicle is damaged.

<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 22, 2010
<dt class="note">[[User:Grimm|Grimm]]
<dd class="note">If an AI group (e.g Mechanized Infantry) has its vehicle locked with its crew in it, it will mount or dismount it anyway. But a player in this group won't be able to enter the vehicle.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<h3 style="display:none">Bottom Section</h3>
